name: Speed
script:
ak.deleteFull()
ak.defs.speed = true
      if not SpeedTimer then
         SpeedTimer = tempTimer(4,[[
                ak.defs.speed = true
                SpeedTimer = false 
                ak.scoreup(target) 
                ]])
      end
matches: Her sense of time is heightened, and her reactions are speeded.
His sense of time is heightened, and his reactions are speeded.
